properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Spacious four bedroom detached family residence situated in a quiet cul-de-sac within easy reach of Chislehurst station. The ground floor features a generous dual-aspect living room, a formal dining room, and a modern high-specification kitchen with integrated appliances. Upstairs, the master suite includes a private en-suite shower room, alongside three further double bedrooms and a contemporary family bathroom. Exterior benefits include a private driveway for three cars, a double garage, and a beautifully landscaped south-facing rear garden with a patio area perfect for entertaining...

A stunning one bedroom third-floor apartment located in the heart of Lewisham, ideally positioned for commuters with Lewisham Station and DLR links just moments away. This energy-efficient home boasts an expansive open-plan kitchen and living area with floor-to-ceiling windows leading to a private balcony with panoramic city views. The bedroom is a well-proportioned double with fitted wardrobes, and the sleek bathroom features a heated towel rail and rainfall shower. Residents also benefit from a secure entry system, 24-hour concierge service, and access to communal rooftop gardens...

Impressive five bedroom executive detached home offering over 2,500 sq. ft. of luxury living space in the prestigious Sevenoaks area. The property includes a grand entrance hall, three versatile reception rooms, and a bespoke 25' kitchen/breakfast room with marble worktops and bi-fold doors. To the first floor, there are five bedrooms, two with luxury en-suites, and a designer family bathroom. The property is set within a gated plot featuring a double garage and a large private garden backing onto protected woodland. Perfectly located for Sevenoaks school catchments and fast rail links to London Bridge...

Presented in immaculate condition is this three double bedroom penthouse apartment situated in a sought-after riverside development on the Greenwich Peninsula. The property features an exceptional wrap-around terrace offering unobstructed views of the River Thames and the Canary Wharf skyline. Internally, the vast open-plan living space includes solid oak flooring and a designer kitchen with a breakfast bar. All three bedrooms are spacious doubles, with the master offering a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite. Additional features include two underground parking spaces, underfloor heating throughout, and a 999-year lease...

A charming two bedroom Victorian terraced cottage located in the heart of Wimbledon Village, just a short stroll from the common. This characterful home combines period features, such as original fireplaces and sash windows, with modern comforts including a recently fitted shaker-style kitchen and gas central heating. The ground floor offers two interconnected reception rooms and a bright conservatory leading to a secluded cottage garden. The first floor provides two double bedrooms and a spacious family bathroom with a roll-top bath. Offered as Freehold with no onward chain, making it an ideal first-time purchase or investment...
